title: Where will all the Ahri one tricks go?
body:
I'm thinking they will all switch over to lux 
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

replies.body:
They'll still play Ahri.

Might actually have to grow some skills, though.
https://cdn.meme.am/cache/instances/folder208/400x/62677208.jpg
What's happening to Ahri now?
Getting nerfed
Mind giving me a link?

> [{quoted}](name=Ahri Body Pillow,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AEsLRxZW,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2017-05-16T19:33:30.316+0000)
>
> Mind giving me a link?

http://www.surrenderat20.net/2017/05/red-post-collection-dev-diary-on.html

thank yaaaa

hope it's the e change, makes her a lot more bearable to play against i'd imagine
the nerf isn't even that big. if it's just an increase in her mana cost, it's not gonna fully stop us from playing her since most of us build {{item:3802}} first on her anyway.
Well it depends, if all they are doing is shifting damage from w/r to E then woo i won't notice a thing since i been maxing E second instead of W anyways {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
Honestly, I'd love it if Riot shifted enough damage to justify me doing this. Her W is such a meh skill.
I'm gonna keep playing Ahri, lol. Their planned nerfs are meaningless unless they go crazy with the numbers.
{{champion:134}}

Last time I checked Syndra is nothing alike Ahri.

Well, except scaling off AP.
Its mostly to do with moving on to the next strong ap mid laner.

The main reason Ahri is strong is her safety, especially the MS buff provided by Q.

Syndra has nothing like that, plus she isn't that strong either.
Or am I missing something?

Janna probably
 
Equally attractive, equally skill-less

I like how ahri was regarded as having a high skill floor and extremely high skill ceiling before the circlejerk started. As an ahri main, i cant wait for the nerfs so people will stop crying and being pathetic every time they get outplayed or do something critically stupid.

Of course, they probably wont.
I main ahri
I could never tell
Most can't, I'm really bad at her
With stats that scream "FOTM", and janna as a more used champ.. Not sure if that post was meant to be ironic or not.. {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
She has been regarded as having high skill floor and cap only by ahri mains.

> [{quoted}](name=I Do Not Exist,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AEsLRxZW,comment-id=000300000001,timestamp=2017-05-17T05:22:52.200+0000)
>
> She ha she been regarded as having high skill floor and cap only by ahri mains.

Only Ahris charm is pretty much the most missed skill shot in the LCS. But no skill.  Whatever.
Yeah pull a random statement out of your as$, that would help

Nah man Lux sucks.

Probably Ori if they prefer mages and LB if they prefer assassins.
Those nerf possibilities look even less intimidating than her passive nerf.

Nothing will happen.

Riot is beating around the bush as usual.

>Ahri 
>Almost certainly needs a nerf. Direction not certain yet, two main ones being considered being higher Q mana cost (hit waveclear/pressure early) or shifting damage from W/R into E. 

1_._ Took them over 2 years to notice.
2_._ Prioritizing damage and mana despite the fact that utility is the problem. Again. How many champions has it been?

Depends on how hard she is hit.  If she only loses 1-2% win rate, her one tricks will keep playing her and the freelo abusers will drop her.  If she drops much below 50%, I'd expect buffs sometime before the next skin release.
Been getting sick of League anyway so this is nail in the coffin.

They have enough porn to keep them playing her.
Although to be fair the same could be said for Lux, so that's not much of an argument.
